name: undrilled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If an object or material is undrilled, holes have not been made in it using a special tool: All panels came oversized and undrilled. Hold the undrilled moulding in a vice, and apply glue to the cut edge.
If an area of land is undrilled, holes have not been dug in it from which to remove oil: He crossed the border to Tennessee in the 1990s, intrigued by its expanses of undrilled land.
More examplesFewer examplesWe drilled out several small cylinders of wood, leaving an undrilled layer of 1 cm between sample layers.Reserves are expected to be recovered from new wells on undrilled acreage.
